class_notes: Interested students should request permission from Professor Lance Gunderson (lgunder@emory.edu)
course_description: This course allows students to explore the ecological and legal dimensions of environmental issues of biodiversity conservation, ecosystem management, and sustainable development. The class will combine readings and case studies.
prerequisites: This course requires ENVS 131  or ENVS_ OX 131 or BIOL_OX 111 or BIOL 142 or  BIOL_OX 142 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite OR permission of instructor.
schedule_location: TTh 2:30pm-3:45pm in Math & Science Center - W502
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4815, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: L. Gunderson, Status: Closed
